dc_title_s: Military Installations - Federal Military Installations: Maryland
dc_description_s: This is a MD iMAP hosted service layer. Find more information at http://imap.maryland.gov. The Department of Information Technology (DoIT) has identified military installations within the State of Maryland. These facilities offer jobs for military personnel living in and around the installations, as well as, opportunities for public/private partnerships which benefit the citizens of Maryland. In addition, these installations are used in emergency management and response and are partners with the State of Maryland during emergency situations. Last Updated: 12/2014
